US: U.S. has placed restrictions on certain immigrant and non-immigrant visas for citizens of a few specific countries, including Burundi, Cuba, and Venezuela
Thailand: Thailand offers visa-free entry to citizens of over 60 countries, including most European countries, the USA, Canada, India Australia, Japan, South Korea, and many Asian countries such as China, India, and Vietnam. The duration of visa-free stays can vary, but many countries are granted 60-day visa-free entry, which can sometimes be extended
